title: Call Of Duty 4 (v1.5) Single/Multi-Player Crack [Incl. KeyGen]
description:
Latest cracks for the v1.5 update of COD4. 


The v1.4 update must be installed before you can update to v1.5

1.4: http://www.gamershell.com/download_22482.shtml
1.5: http://www.gamershell.com/download_23036.shtml


After installing the patches, simple paste &#039;iw3mp.exe&#039; and &#039;iw3sp.exe&#039; into your installation directory overwriting the existing files. 

---

PunkBuster enabled multiplayer servers blacklist some of the keys from Razor1911&#039;s KeyGen. Just carry on regenerating, it can be hit and miss. To avoid this disable PunkBuster.


To change the key for an existing installation open the Registry Editor [Run -> regedit) and navigate to:

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Activision\Call of Duty 4

Or for 64-Bit users...

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Activision\Call of Duty 4

Edit the key value remembering to remove the hyphens


Recommend the Killing4Fun.nl cracked servers for multiplayer. A list of online cracked servers can be found:
 <a href="
http://www.epcgaming.com/epcgaming_v2/servers2.php?gameid=16&filter=online" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.epcgaming.com/epcgaming_v2/servers2.php?gameid=16&filter=online</a>


Enjoy!
XiNiTHAOUS
